job.title: Senior Software Engineer, Full Stack
job.description: pEkata a Mastercard company is the global standard in identity verification providing businesses worldwide the ability to link any digital transaction to the human behind it Our Ekata Identity Engine the first and only of its kind uses complex machine learning to combine features derived from the billions of transactions within our proprietary network and the data from our graph to deliver industry leading risk assessment solutionsppbrppWe are looking for a strongSenior Full Stack Engineerstrong based in Seattle that thrives on designing coding and maintaining web applications written in Ruby and JavaScript Our ideal candidate would have the skills and desire to understand our entire stack from Postgres to Redis to Rails and the passion to champion new and exciting technologies to solve Ekatas unique and challenging problemsppbrppYour ideal job should be one where you work in a small team and are empowered to make yourself and your team more productive on a daily basis You should want to be part of a team where your desire to grow and learn is valued and aptly rewarded where using and contributing to open source are looked upon as an asset where innovating and executing are core to your teams beliefsppbrppstronguIn the Senior Full Stack Engineer Role you will ustrongpulliBuild complex web applications in a web framework Ruby on Rails and ReactliliDesign features where the business problem is defined but technical strategy is notliliWrite a crossdomain JavaScript applicationliliFollow and create best practices for clean code and architectureliliDeploy and operate apps in the cloud Amazon Rackspace Heroku etcliliEnsure code follows the design and insist on the highest coding standardsliliMaintain sufficiently generic yet simple and economical solutionliliProvide mentorship across teams and help to hire and grow the bestliulpbrppstronguOur ideal Senior Full Stack Engineer will haveustrongpulliKnowledge of REST GraphQL SSO and clientserver interactionliliFluency in one or more languages like Ruby Clojure Scala JavaScript TypeScript Java PythonliliDeep understanding of internet protocols and standardsliliProficiency with writing and optimizing crossbrowser CSS and HTMLliliKnowledgeable of scaling techniques caching asynchronousbackground job queues etcliliExperience with SQL and NoSQL databases and browser plugin developmentliliAptitude to quickly learn new languages and technologies as necessaryliliExperience with Agile development methodologiesliliProven experience building highly scalable and available production web apps from glass to the databaseliliA philosophy of iteration and continuous improvementliliBS or MS in Computer Science or equivalent experienceliulpbrppstrongThis position is located at our headquarters in Seattle WAstrongppbrppUnwavering in our pursuit of standardizing global identity data we are approachable real people that genuinely care about the success of those we partner with With a commitment to service innovation and ownership Ekata is a dynamic place to work for folks who want to make an impact on a global scale We provide learning amp development opportunities for each employee and promote worklife flexibility through selfmanaged time off Headquartered in downtown Seattle Ekata is growing internationally with offices in Budapest Hungary Amsterdam and SingaporeppbrppTo learn more about the experience of working at Ekata visit httpsekatacomcareersppbrppEkata prides itself on celebrating diversity inclusivity and being an equalopportunity employerp
